about_the_game:
Bring your magical girls and modern fashionistas to life with Heroine Character Generator 2 for MZ! Gee-Kun-Soft is back with MZ generator parts to take your female leads from drab to fab! This pack’s 38 generator parts contain new accessories, eyes, clothing options, and hairstyles to help you make your heroines look just how you imagine them.

All new front and rear hairstyles let you give your heroines faces framed by luscious curls or bangs swept to each side. Let your tomboy tie her long hair up with a ribbon or cut it into a bob so that it’s easy to maintain. For your warriors with long hair, how about a thick braid to keep it out of the way during battle? And when the fighting is done and it’s time to party, let it fall loose in long flowing curls. Don’t forget to decorate it with the pack’s new accessories! Adorable cat ears with a small flower accessory or a fluffy bow on the top of her head can really show off your characters’ personalities.

And if you’ve been needing more outfits, this pack is for you! 20 clothing options offer all sorts of possibilities for modern worlds. Give your schoolgirl-turned-magical-girl a simple uniform for her day to day scenes and a sleeveless dress with stars on her skirt when she needs to take on some baddies! Fantasy games can also find a use for some of the dresses that would be perfect for wearing to fancy parties. Or have a scene where your heroine needs to dress as a maid to sneak into a noble’s mansion.

With 3 AccA, 1 AccB, 1 beast ear, 20 clothing, 5 eyes, 4 front hairs, and 4 rear hairs generator pieces, this pack is full of pieces to help create your heroines. Make sure to check out the Heroine Character Generator 2 for MZ pack today!

* Compatible with RPG Maker MZ

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
